exec: ts-node --project tsconfig.json -r tsconfig-paths/register src/app.ts -w ./work -b ./backup2 -d ./diff -s print -o ONC1234567 -l 7 -k .git node_modules
exec2: ts-node --project tsconfig.json -r tsconfig-paths/register src/app.ts -w ./work -b ./backup2 -d ./diff -s print -o noONC12345 -k .git node_modules
